1.name: The Silence of the Lambs
1.description: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

2.name: Point Break
2.description: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

3.name: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
3.description: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son, John Connor, from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

4.name: The Addams Family
4.description: Con artists plan to fleece an eccentric family using an accomplice who claims to be their long-lost uncle.

5.name: Cape Fear
5.description: A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a fourteen-year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him.

6.name: Hook
6.description: When Captain Hook kidnaps his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and reclaim his youthful spirit in order to challenge his old enemy.

7.name: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
7.description: When Robin and his Moorish companion come to England and the tyranny of the Sheriff of Nottingham, he decides to fight back as an outlaw.

8.name: Beauty and the Beast
8.description: A selfish prince is cursed to become a monster for the rest of his life, unless he learns to fall in love with a beautiful young woman he keeps prisoner.

9.name: My Girl
9.description: A young girl, on the threshold of her teen years, finds her life turning upside down, when she is accompanied by an unlikely friend.

10.name: Backdraft
10.description: Two Chicago firefighter brothers, who don't get along, have to work together while a dangerous arsonist is on the loose.

11.name: Thelma & Louise
11.description: Two best friends set out on an adventure, but it soon turns around to a terrifying escape from being hunted by the police, as these two girls escape for the crimes they committed.

12.name: Boyz n the Hood
12.description: Follows the lives of three young males living in the Crenshaw ghetto of Los Angeles, dissecting questions of race, relationships, violence and future prospects.

13.name: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead
13.description: Five siblings are left alone all summer when their mom leaves town and the evil babysitter bites the dust.

14.name: JFK
14.description: New Orleans District Attorney Jim Garrison discovers there's more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.

15.name: Drop Dead Fred
15.description: A young woman finds her already unstable life rocked by the presence of a rambunctious imaginary friend from childhood.

16.name: The Doors
16.description: The story of the famous and influential 1960s rock band The Doors and its lead singer and composer, Jim Morrison, from his days as a UCLA film student in Los Angeles, to his untimely death in Paris, France at age 27 in 1971.

17.name: City Slickers
17.description: On the verge of turning 40, an unhappy Manhattan yuppie is roped into joining his two friends on a cattle drive in the southwest.

18.name: Fried Green Tomatoes
18.description: A housewife who is unhappy with her life befriends an old lady in a nursing home and is enthralled by the tales she tells of people she used to know.

19.name: The Rocketeer
19.description: A young pilot stumbles onto a prototype jetpack that allows him to become a high flying masked hero.

20.name: My Own Private Idaho
20.description: Two best friends living on the streets of Portland as hustlers embark on a journey of self discovery and find their relationship stumbling along the way.

21.name: Return to the Blue Lagoon
21.description: In this sequel to The Blue Lagoon (1980), two children are stranded on a beautiful island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together and eventually become suntanned teenagers in love.

22.name: The Last Boy Scout
22.description: A private detective's protected female witness is murdered, prompting him and the victim's boyfriend to investigate the crime that leads to a corrupt politician and a crooked football team owner.

23.name: Career Opportunities
23.description: Jim is the dorky son of a local cement contractor who lives at home and has no direction. Josie is the gorgeous daughter of a wealthy businessman who dreams of leaving town. When Jim is ...                See full summary »

24.name: The Fisher King
24.description: A former radio DJ, suicidally despondent because of a terrible mistake he made, finds redemption in helping a deranged homeless man who was an unwitting victim of that mistake.

25.name: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
25.description: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.

26.name: Paprika
26.description: A young country girl comes to town and works in a brothel in order to help her fiance get the money to start his own business. "Paprika" is the name given to her by the madam.

27.name: Doc Hollywood
27.description: A young doctor on his way across the country to a job interview crashes his car in a small town and is sentenced to work for several days at the town hospital.

28.name: Nothing But Trouble
28.description: A businessman and his friends are captured by a sadistic judge and his equally odd family in the backwoods of a bizarre mansion.

29.name: Hudson Hawk
29.description: A cat burglar is forced to steal Da Vinci works of art for a world domination plot.

30.name: Sleeping with the Enemy
30.description: A young woman fakes her own death in an attempt to escape her nightmarish marriage, but discovers it is impossible to elude her controlling husband.

31.name: Naked Lunch
31.description: After developing an addiction to the substance he uses to kill bugs, an exterminator accidentally kills his wife, and becomes involved in a secret government plot being orchestrated by giant bugs in a port town in North Africa.

32.name: Barton Fink
32.description: A renowned New York playwright is enticed to California to write for the movies and discovers the hellish truth of Hollywood.

33.name: Hot Shots!
33.description: A parody of Top Gun (1986) in which a talented but unstable fighter pilot must overcome the ghosts of his father and save a mission sabotaged by greedy weapons manufacturers.

34.name: Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey
34.description: A tyrant from the future creates evil android doubles of Bill and Ted and sends them back to eliminate the originals.

35.name: Pretty Hattie's Baby
35.description: An unreleased film about a white girl adopted by a black family in 1950s Nevada. Based on the early life of Fauna Hodel whose grandfather is prime suspect in the Black Dahlia murder case.

36.name: Father of the Bride
36.description: With his oldest daughter's wedding approaching, a father finds himself reluctant to let go.

37.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II: The Secret of the Ooze
37.description: The Turtles and the Shredder battle once again, this time for the last canister of the ooze that created the Turtles, with which Shredder wants to unleash an army of new mutants.

38.name: The Commitments
38.description: When Jimmy Rabbitte wants to start a band, he has open auditions at his house.

39.name: Double Impact
39.description: Twin brothers are separated when their parents are murdered but 25 years later they re-unite in order to avenge their parents' death.

40.name: Bugsy
40.description: The story of how Benjamin "Bugsy" Siegel started Las Vegas.

41.name: L.A. Story
41.description: With the help of a talking freeway billboard, a wacky weatherman tries to win the heart of an English newspaper reporter, who is struggling to make sense of the strange world of early 1990s Los Angeles.

42.name: The People Under the Stairs
42.description: Two adults and a juvenile break into a house occupied by a brother and sister and their stolen children. There, they must fight for their lives.

43.name: What About Bob?
43.description: A successful psychotherapist loses his mind after one of his most dependent patients, an obsessive-compulsive neurotic, tracks him down during his family vacation.

44.name: The Naked Gun 2½: The Smell of Fear
44.description: Lieutenant Frank Drebin discovers that his ex-girlfriend's new beau is involved in a plot to kidnap a scientist who advocates solar energy.

45.name: New Jack City
45.description: A crime lord ascends to power and becomes megalomaniacal while a maverick police detective vows to stop him.

46.name: Cybernator
46.description: In the future, an L.A. cop whose girlfriend is a stripper uncovers a conspiracy concerning killer cyborgs.

47.name: Curly Sue
47.description: A homeless man and his young companion, who survive by conning people, meet a woman who may need them even more than they need her.

48.name: The Man in the Moon
48.description: A coming of age story set in the south of the U.S. when Elvis was King.

49.name: Showdown in Little Tokyo
49.description: Two cops have to work together to bring down the Yakuza, while trying to protect a beautiful woman.

50.name: Harley Davidson and the Marlboro Man
50.description: Forced by the imminent foreclosure of their friend's bar, two lifelong buddies will decide to rob a bank's armoured car, not knowing that its cargo is not money but a new street drug.
